title: DC CONSTANTLY 6.8
body: I kept getting dced during in-game(normal game ) ,i checked my internet connection on speed test  -it was 28 ms , 52mb/s , 3mb upload which i think it is perfectly fine.... idk how to explain this but i dc for about 50 sec - 2min sometime i have to exit the client completely to get back in the game .. i know its normal game but i want to know if there is anything to solve the problem

replies.body:
If you are consistently disconnecting from matches of League, there definitely seems like some sort of weird connection issue going on here with your computer and the individual Game Server.  Unfortunately, its hard for me to say where the issue exists exactly (it may even be on our end).  In an effort to rule out some possible root causes, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are quite a lot of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
I wish that riot would give a response regarding the matter. There are a myriad of posts saying the same thing
